org.ehcache.core.spi.cache
Interface InternalCacheManager

All Superinterfaces:
CacheManager
All Known Implementing Classes:
EhcacheManager
public interface InternalCacheManager
extends CacheManager

The Service-facing version of a CacheManager. This interface adds methods used internally by service implementations.
